name: Art Pages: Color By Number
description:
Art Pages: Color By Number – is an amazing coloring application which can help you to relax after a hard working day, release the stress and bring you positive emotions!

The App provides a great variety of coloring pictures with fairy-tale animals, picturesque nature and different interesting people!
The game proposes to your attention more than 1000 unique pictures for all ages both for boys and girls. The game is both pleasant and relaxing.

The main coloring rules are very simple : on each picture the numbers are depicted. The colors correspond to the numbers. The palette is changed depending on the picture. The only thing you need to do is to choose the color you wish and color the spot on the layout corresponding to the number. What do I have to do when the pictures finish? The answer to this question is simple! The pictures will never finish! The coloring pages at Art Pages: Color By Number keep updating all the time so you should not worry about the what to do when the game is finished!

Your children will be amused and get much pleasure out of this fascinating game that occupies the minimum amount of memory at your smart-phone with minimized battery consumption. So you need not to worry about charging level.

The game can be played everywhere at any time: at work, at home, at leissure time, in public transport waiting in a line in a traffic jam or while standing in a queue at municipal establishments. The main advantage of Art Pages: Color By Number is off-line access.

Moreover, with wide range of difficulty levels you can discover the potential of an artist at your child has got. Meanwhile, the colorful palette will amaze the imagination of your dearest kid.

While playing you can develop the accuracy of your actions, skills, perseverance and concentration and relax at the same time.

The simple interface allows your children to understand the sense of the game themselves, so you will not need to switch on the game for them all the time. They will do it themselves!

Art Pages: Color By Number – the game which is always at hand and will ever make you bored. Bring colorful images and bright emotions to your life with Art Pages: Color By Number!
